Items.Title: Oversight - Combating Hate Crimes: Safety for all New Yorkers.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Combating Hate Crimes: Safety for all New Yorkers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to enact the Local Law Enforcement Hate Crimes Prevention Act of 2007, which would provide federal assistance to states and local jurisdictions to prosecute hate crimes.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to reintroduce and pass the Local Law Enforcement Hate Crimes Prevention Act
